body_html:
By an ATen commit, I meant make a PR to ATen directly: https://github.com/zdevito/ATen.

After that's been merged you can ask someone to update ATen in pytorch or create a PR yourself by following these instructions (see the ATen section): https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/wiki/Updating-TH,-THC,-THNN,-THCUNN-subtrees
body_text:
By an ATen commit, I meant make a PR to ATen directly: https://github.com/zdevito/ATen.
After that's been merged you can ask someone to update ATen in pytorch or create a PR yourself by following these instructions (see the ATen section): https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/wiki/Updating-TH,-THC,-THNN,-THCUNN-subtrees
body:
By an ATen commit, I meant make a PR to ATen directly: https://github.com/zdevito/ATen.

After that's been merged you can ask someone to update ATen in pytorch or create a PR yourself by following these instructions (see the ATen section): https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/wiki/Updating-TH,-THC,-THNN,-THCUNN-subtrees
